isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - ASSEMBLE

svcproc.title: GEAR SHIFT LEVER
svcproc.para: Inspect tension spring and washer for wear. Replace if necessary.

Apply Eaton rust preventative lubricant #71212 or equivalent to the shift lever pivot ball. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubes. A lubricant film should cover all surfaces between and including the pivot ball.
Seat the tension spring one coil at a time.

step1.para: With housing bottom facing up, secure the assembly in a vise ( Figure 119).
If the spade pin is damaged, replace and install the new spade pin in housing tower bore ( Figure 119).
In models so equipped, install the nut and washer in the housing bore.
If the O-ring is damaged, replace and lubricate the O-ring with Eaton/Fuller lubricant #71206 supplied with the O-ring kit. Install the O-ring in the housing tower inside groove ( Figure 119).
Align the lever ball slot with the spade pin and position the gear shift lever in the housing tower ( Figure 120).

figure.caption: Figure 120. Position Gear Shift Lever in Housing Tower

step1.para: Install the washer as shown in Figure 120.
Use a tension spring driver to install the tension spring under the housing lugs ( Figure 121).
Remove the assembly from the vise.
Install a rubber boot over the gear shift lever and against the housing.

svcproc.para: Make sure the gear shift lever can move.
